answers.answer: Thanks Mike, I value your opinion because you are extremely knowledgeable in this subject. :)
Thanks for the vote of confidence but I'm still learning every day. This is one subject I have been through and I'm pretty sure on this point. Mike

mar ee i do't see any where  that you have misused the threads/posting.here's the deal: we get six new threads to post each day. posts near the top get read more frequently--i sometimes think folks post a question and don't scroll down far enough to get the answers that have been posted by forum members. if the six posted are used, just use a thread already started and type in new question...in the comment area.so don't hesitate to ask questions and talk about how to deal with all this.and don't listen to the junnk about not having syptoms of side effects relate at all to how effective treatment is.best-m.
How do the colors work? Blue post, gray post. Thanks
Thanx mike, I must have missed that thread, Hay it was a question about my eye sight,lol thanx again morgan

Sorry to cut in here but did not want to take up new thread.I went too see my eye DR today I was having blurred visionhe found some wool like spots in the back of my eye, wants tokeep monitoring this.has any one else had this what can course this.He says diabetes, high blood pressure ,HIV, hcv can course this I have had all blood workevery month so I would think my DR has checked all these possibilities any advice appreciated .thank ,Morgan
See post at 7/25 on retina problems. Mike

Thank you all, I feel more at ease.Re: the thread, I just felt that it was perhaps a trivial type question, but it's not the first time I heard that so it started to really bug me. This forum has been so supportive that I feel bad for the people that don't know about it. :)
layla--i think the color thing might be your computer monitor..on my screen the first posting is kind of grey and then the other postings alternate between shades of yellow...does this help?best-m.

I was wondering if the coloring changed when a new post was added to the thread but that didn't seem to be the case so I thought maybe I was missing the point. Sound like our computer colors are set differetly. Since each thread alternates between colors often I thought it meant something. Curious, that's how my mind works. It must make sense somehow, everything does, right? lol Thanks

question: Hi guys, I'm sorry to take up a thread to ask this question, but it's really bugging me. Since I started treatment on 6/6 I've had one really bad weekend, other than that I really can't complain. Occassional headaches especially behind the eye sockets, a little weight loss, a lot of leg pain in the beginning which has now subsided, and has traveled instead to my neck and back. Other than this I feel fine. Well someone just told me that they become concerned when they hear of minimal symtoms or no symtoms, because that usually means that the treatment is not working. I don't believe that there is any correlation between treatment symtoms and clearance, but now I'm kinda of wondering since this seed was planted in my head.What you you guys think ? :)
title: Need opinions
